backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with user profiles, listings, bookings, access control, Stripe integration, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains an empty feature evidence report structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring meta tags, SEO properties, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query, theming, and all route definitions for the frontend app.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for property categories with animated gradient cards and loading skeleton.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityModa: File present but contains no implementation content.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Displays a three‑step booking guide with category‑based icons and animated UI blocks.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: File is empty or contains no content.
frontend/src/components/ExploreSection.t: File is empty or contains no content.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches featured listings and renders them in a grid with loading skeletons and styled ListingCards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with login/logout logic, route navigation, and conditional admin/user options.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: File is empty or contains no content.
Shows an interactive India map with animated city markers indicating active and coming‑soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, footer, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Displays a property card with rating, availability, category icon, and styled variants, linking to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: 3D-styled listing card showing images, availability, rating, category icons, and navigation interaction.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty file or placeholder for a listing detail modal component.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Displays an animated map section with event markers, floating badges, and interactive pin tooltips.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and submitting user profile details with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Renders a badge reflecting a property's status with corresponding color, icon, and styling.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles review display and submission, including rating input, form toggling, validation, and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Interactive or static star rating component supporting partial fill and size variants.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty file or placeholder for testimonial bubble UI component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, listings, reviews, events, and admin-related resources through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, typography, animations, and base UI theming for the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Renders the About Us page with company information, registration details, and leadership profiles using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard, loading admin data, handling access control, managing listings, users, notifications, and settings with extensive UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled booking policy page with scrollable sections detailing platform policies and terms.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Displays a grid of accommodation categories with images and navigates to filtered listings on selection.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring animated category cards, lazy‑loaded map and availability widgets, and navigation to listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Shows listings with category filtering, lazy‑loaded listing cards and map, and syncs selected category with URL search params.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page enabling viewing and editing profile data, saving updates, and logging out via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Provides UI and logic for owners to create, edit, and manage their property listings using form dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Implements a public form for submitting property listings with validation, image uploads, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays a property detail view requiring unlock actions to reveal contact info, including rating, reviews, and download options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters, supporting hash and query formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for adding a new PropertyStatus system, outlining related backend model changes, frontend badge updates, and pending feature requests. Contains architectural notes and existing/new feature definitions for implementing the 4‑status model without additional logic.
